short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A reconnaissance tool for faster subdomain enumeration with DNS record checker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool is made for pentesters and cyber experts ,
It has the above features in it.
1) subdomain enumeration
2) IP addresses
3) Reverse DNS
4) DNS Records checker
5) IP to Geolocation converter
